lines.text: I have a message for you from Tito. He say for you to meet him... in HELL!
I want Hatcher dead. I want his family dead. And if you can't kill him, I go kill him, and then I'm gonna kill you.
Hey, you want some blow?
Yeah, I want some blow. Put your hands where I can see 'em or I'm gonna blow your head off.
Well?
One thought he was invincible... the other thought he could fly.
So?
They were both wrong.
Everybody want go heaven. Nobody want dead. Afraid.

You bailed out a Jamaican street named Monkey the other day, I want him. This other piece of shit, Screwface, I want him. I know you're a scumbag and a puke, I don't mind that, but give me what I need and I'll leave here a nice guy. If you don't, I'm gonna fuck you up.
I'll fuckin' sell anything to anybody, Hatcher, except you, man, I wouldn't sell you the sweat off my balls.
Hey, where Nesta man?

[whispers in his ear]
Nesta and Jimmy Fingers are dead at the hotel.
Nesta dead. Who do it, the white boy, Hatcher.
[Nago nodes head]
[Screwface throws table up and hits gang member with table leg]
I want Hatcher dead. I want his family dead. If you can't kill him, I go kill him. Then I'm gonna kill you.
You fuck with my family, you die.

[to Hatcher]
Screwface kill me a thousand deaths worse than you. Go find him your fucking self!
[dives through window]
Look upon this madman! Him dead and him don't even know it!
I want you to meet my sister, Goddess of Fire.
[after killing Screwface and his twin]
I hope there weren't triplets.
God made men.

[after a demo of the submachinegun]
Massive cool! Forward Jamaica!

[holding up a silenced sniper rifle]
My silent partner. A whisper in the ear from *this* girl goes a long way, know what I'm sayin'?

[after firing a silenced machine gun]
Didn't hear a thing, did you? Alright, you heard the slide clicking...

[after roughing up some of the "posse"]
Now that's *serious* fun!
Abso-fuckin'-lutely!
I love giving away all my possessions, it makes me feel real spiritual.

[to Max]
Coach! Put me in! Put me in!

[stunned]
Well, I'll be damned. Trouble.

[grins]
That's me.
